description:
Course Highlights:

  • 10 Individual, Bite-Sized Lessons
  • Downloadable Excel Files
  • Verifiable Certificate of Completion
  • Instant Access to Instructor and the ProductivityMe Community
  • 1080p HD Quality Video
  • Regular Course Updates

In this Course:

Learning Excel takes time, particularly if you try to do it without any structure!

In this course, we'll walk you through the top ten skills you need to know in order to excel in Microsoft Excel!

Give us an hour, and we’ll help you to get to the next level of mastery in Microsoft Excel.

In this short, easy-to-follow training course...

We'll Cover:

  1. Autosum
  2. The Quick Access Toolbar
  3. The Shortcut Menu & The Mini-Toolbar
  4. The Quick Analysis Tool
  5. The Fill Handle
  6. Flash Fill
  7. Charts & Graphs
  8. Recommended Charts
  9. Sorting & Filters
  10. Tables

Our Approach:

At the end of each video, you have the chance to prove your mastery by completing a small practice exercise thus testing the core skill that you’ve just learned.

You can easily follow along in each lesson by using the downloadable course exercise files provided in Lecture 2.

If you have questions, comments, ideas, we’d love to hear from you. Email or message us any time.

Final Thoughts:

Alright, that’s it for now.

Look forward to having you in class!

Cheers,

Tolan & Ryan
ProductivityMe Co-Founders
title: Intermediate Excel: Crash Course w/ Downloadable Excel Files
